answers.answer: I'm measuring one day ahead based on the size of baby but I know the exact date I conceived.
I know when I conceived also, but I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes and my baby is now measuring 2 weeks ahead. Just curious if this is normal.

The ultrasoud is just an estimate.  Its not a definite thing. But yes. I measured 2 weeks for.my second kid. Im on my 3rd and hes measuring 1 week ahead. And everyone is fine.My second one came early. But thats cuz i already had a premature baby. They say if you already had a premature baby, you keep having them..  i havent gotten diabetes. If youre afraid youre going to get them. Ask to do the nasty glucose screening twice.You drink some nasty sugar drink. They take your blood an hour later. It checks to see if youre developing diabetes. They for sure make you drink it by 28 weeks, at least once.

Sorry i didnt see you were . already diagnosed with diabetes.Then yes. Its normal for you cuz your hormones and insulin is all out of whack so baby is getting more nutrients.  Itll be okay. Just steer clear of lots of sugary stuff and drink lots of water.I didnt have diabetes but my child winded up being okay.If your baby gets too big. Theyll deliver you early so you both dont have complications.But the ultrasound is just an estimate.

I'm 34 weeks and I've already had to have both glucose tests done. My first child never measured ahead. I just haven't talked to my doctor since I had my growth ultrasound done today. I had a growth ultrasound because I have gestational diabetes.

Im 7 months pregnant right now. My ultrasounds say hes a week later. My doctor said my uterus is too big so hes bigger than hes supposed to be. But hes healthy.My doctor just checks on me a lot. My 2nd, they added a few more ultrasounds throughout the pregnancy to check the water around him and what have you. They checked my cervix earlier than they would. But other than that. All was ok.
My son was 3 weeks ahead I was due the 2ed of Jan 2015 and he came out the 29th of DEC 2014 everything was fine

question: Anyone's baby ever measured 2 weeks ahead? How did it turn out?
title: Measuring ahead
